ModMetaData.name: Posthuman Drift: Warcat Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Xylthixlm
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Warcat xenotype and associated genes.\n\nThese graceful predators were forged in military gene-vats: part human, part great cat, all fast-twitch muscle. But something in the splice broke, leaving them dependent on raw meat to survive. Now they roam the rimworlds in tight-knit clans, hunting anything they can bring down—even other xenohumans.
